page.title: 06 HOMELIFE
page.content: My Home. I live in a modern house made of brick and tile. I have got a television and a radio which work by electricity. We have a freezer which keeps food frozen, and a refrigerator which keeps food cool. We have got a piano and a computer. We have a modern bathroom with a bath, a handbasin and a toilet. We have a dining room, a breakfast room and four bedrooms. One of the bedrooms is my own. We have a lounge where we can sit in front of a fireplace in which we can burn wood and coal. We have a big garden and a pet dog. I have one brother. Dad and Mum each have a car to go to work and the shops. ROBERT WILLIAMS AGE 9.
